snippet: The latest move comes with efforts to merge Samsung affiliates gaining speed after the patriarch of group’s controlling family was hospitalized in May.
abstract: Samsung Group's shipbuilding and engineering arms agree to merge by end of 2014; movie is latest step in restructuring, coming as apparent response to failing health of group's controlling family patriarch, Lee Kun-hee.
lead_paragraph: The latest move comes with efforts to merge Samsung affiliates gaining speed after the patriarch of group’s controlling family was hospitalized in May.

headline.main: Samsung Group’s Shipbuilding and Engineering Arms to Merge
